name: Blood Knuckle: Rooftop Of The Impossible Skyscraper
name_original: Blood Knuckle: Rooftop Of The Impossible Skyscraper
description:
Scale, puzzle and punch your way to the top of a towering 20-floor skyscraper- but not just any skyscraper!

Your brother is using his dangerous power to put you both in danger! You must chase after him by climbing up a Sorcerer's skyscraper- and in the process, forget everything you know about skyscrapers! With his magic powers, the Sorcerer has made this skyscraper like no other- a floor could be anything, from an office to an arcade to a circus! Adventure through unique settings and solve puzzles, play minigames, pulverize enemies and more as you live out the fantastical fantasy adventure of your wildest dreams!

...

Blood Knuckle: Rooftop Of The Impossible Skyscraper" is a puzzle-solving action game. Scale to the top of a 20-floor tall magical skyscraper run by an evil wizard! Each floor provides a fun and challenging puzzle, each unique from the last!

Originally released November 19th, 2021
Special thanks to SheepTester for code/exporting help
